snippet: Kathleen McCartney, the dean of the Harvard Graduate School of Education, will be the next president of Smith College, effective July 1.
abstract: Harvard Graduate School of Education dean Kathleen McCartney is to be next president of Smith College, effective July 1.
lead_paragraph: Kathleen McCartney, the dean of the Harvard Graduate School of Education, will be the next president of Smith College, effective July 1.

headline.seo: Kathleen McCartney, a Dean at Harvard, Is Chosen to Lead Smith College
headline.main: Massachusetts: A Dean at Harvard Is Chosen to Lead Smith College
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: A Dean at Harvard Is Chosen To Lead Smith College
